entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 6:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
